title: 5E Learning Cycle-Based Elementary Science Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theory and understanding of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A Practice-Centered Course for Pre-Service Teachers to Strengthen Competencies in Developing Elementary Science Educational Materials

learning_goals: Learners can apply phase-specific characteristics of the 5E Learning Cycle (Engagement-Exploration-Explanation-Elaboration-Evaluation) model to actual lesson design
Learners can develop learner-centered digital science educational materials using participatory design methods
Learners can explain SCORM standard-based learning object creation and metadata utilization strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
